LanguageData.Pa_PaK44ATG.label: 128mm Pak 44/L55 Anti-Tank Gun
LanguageData.Pa_FlaK40AA.label: Dual 12,8cm FlaK 40/L61 Heavy Anti-Aircraft Gun
LanguageData.Turret_PaK44HATGP.label: 12,8cm PaK 44 HATGP
LanguageData.Turret_PaK44HATGP.description: PaK 44/L55 12,8cm Heavy Anti-Tank Gun(Platform), an ancient Late War Anti-Tank gun, extremely powerful, heavy and expensive old world technology, capable to penetrate and cause serious damage for all the ground armored vehicle of its era, to the point of consider it excessive or overkill.
LanguageData.Turret_FlaK40ZHAAP.label: 12,8cm FlaK 40 HAAP
LanguageData.Turret_FlaK40ZHAAP.description: FlaK 40/L61 12,8cm Heavy Anti-Aircraft Gun(Platform), an ancient Mid-Late War Anti-Aircraft gun, extremely powerful, heavy and insanely expensive piece of old world technology, with dual 12,8cm heavy barrel and a Semi-Autoloading system to improve its combat effectiveness, designed to deal with flying fortress of its era, mostly placed in heavily defended area, specially over Flakturms, although is an AA gun, it can effectively destroy any land vehicle of its era from long range without sweat.
LanguageData.Pa_complexcannon_Crate.label: Complex Cannon Crate
LanguageData.Pa_complexcannon_Crate.description: Use this to build complex cannon piece, depends the complexity, it might use multiple crates.
LanguageData.MinifiedTurret_Pa_PaK44ATG.label: 12,8cm PaK 44 HATGP
LanguageData.MinifiedTurret_Pa_FlaK40ZAA.label: 12,8cm FlaK 40 HAAP
